metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6473 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An invalid hostname option can trigger an assertion failure in the Kea DHCPv4 server process (kea-dhcp4), causing the server process to exit. Versions affected: 1.4.0 to 1.5.0, 1.6.0-beta1, and 1.6.0-beta2.

criterions.comment: isc-kea: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
